viewData.name: Lenovo 14" ThinkPad X1 Yoga Multi-Touch 2-in-1 Laptop
viewData.short_description: Buy Lenovo 14" ThinkPad X1 Yoga Multi-Touch 2-in-1 Laptop featuring 2.6 GHz Intel Core i7-6600U Dual-Core, 16GB of LPDDR3 SDRAM | 512GB M.2 SSD 14" 2560 x 1440 Multi-Touch IPS Display. Review Lenovo X1 Yoga
viewData.long_description: The 14" ThinkPad X1 Yoga Multi-Touch 2-in-1 Laptop from Lenovo is a system whose screen can rotate up to 360Â° to vary between laptop, tent, stand, and tablet mode. That means you can select a specific mode based on what you need to do and combine it with the keyboard, TouchPad Pen Pro, and/or the 10-point multi-touch screen to help maximize your productivity.
